segments.text: Well , we've finally put the finishing touches on the training programs for next year . Here's a report showing the projected costs as well as the expected return on investment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Return on investment ? How can you have a return on this kind of investment ? Can you really calculate the value of these training programs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure ! It's not a real figure , of course . It's just an estimate based on rehiring costs , and the potential lost revenue that results from incompetence .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wow ! I'm impressed . So , what's in the cards for future training ? Will it be in-house or off-site ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A little of both . We'll have a few daylong sessions for things like business writing skills and software training . Those are available to everyone . We also have a variety of other programs
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I see that here ... continuing education for the IT department , a time management course for accounting , and team building for sales . Anything planned for HR ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A holiday , I hope ! No , really , we are looking into some courses on motivational techniques . We'll add them to the list when we choose a lecturer .
segments.speaker: S1
